## api-certs package

API for managing SSL certificates

## Remarks

Version 1.0.0

|  --- | --- |
|  [Cert](./api-certs.cert.md) | SSL certificate |
|  [CertMetadata](./api-certs.certmetadata.md) | SSL certificate metadata |
|  [CertMetadataList](./api-certs.certmetadatalist.md) | List of certificate metadata records with pagination information |
|  [DomainValidation](./api-certs.domainvalidation.md) | Domain validation status for a security certificate |
